rrodriguez - (17:45): hi, please, could I download template-xe.xar from anywhere? Version 2.1 The originally imported/attached file is broken here. Thanks!  
sdumitriu - (17:54): Hi rrodriguez  
sdumitriu - (17:54): Try here: http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/com/xpn/xwiki/products/xwiki-enterprise-manager-wiki-administrator/2.1/xwiki-enterprise-manager-wiki-administrator-2.1.xar  
sdumitriu - (17:54): It should be attached to the XemManager.Install document  
rrodriguez - (17:56): it was a silly question, I'm afraid. I was trying to find only that file, but I realize now that the easiest way of getting it is by selecting it from the file you have posted. Thanks, Sergiu.  
rrodriguez - (17:57): BTW, how could I explore the content of XAR file working in a Mac OS X box?  
sdumitriu - (18:03): Rename it to .zip  
jbrBridge - (18:06): [Ricardo Rodriguez] sdumitriu: Thanks!  
sdumitriu - (18:06): You're welcome
